page.title: 07The Chelsfield Summer Fete
page.content: On Saturday 22nd of June the Summer Fete was being held in th parish garden.There were many stores such as "Spin for a Coke,Raffle,Lucky Dip,Soak the Teacher,Smash the China,Peg Game" and many more. My mum was on the "Spin For A Coke Stall". The Fete started at 2.00pm and lasted until 5.30pm.At 2.30pm everyone stopped and Chelsfield School did an exhibition of country dancing,it was a bit tricky because it had been raining all the morning and the grass was rather slippy.After this was the Fancy Dress competition won by Christy who was dressed as a tube of Smarties.Whilst all this was going on a dog show was also taking place. I had a go at "Soak the Teacher" and threw 3 sponges at my teacher Mr.Eshelby.After I had been on most of the stalls Iwent home with my mum.
